Html:
There is quite a rich set of types related to SVG (e.g. SVGCircleElement), but it's not clear whether one should use DOM-related methods like SetAttribute or type-related properties (like the radius 'r' property on the SVG circle).

The question is; how should one use/access SVG through TypeScript?

Thanks, Fr.
Thanks for the question.  A good place to ask questions about best practices is our forum on StackOverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/typescript
